title: Arizona Is Where I Live
description: ARIZONA Is Where I Live is a masterful and learning display of the Sonoran Desert, the mountains,the lakes, the Grand Canyon and of the animals that make Arizona one of the most unique and interestingstates in the Union. The illustrations bring out the beauty of Arizona as displayed by the artistic drawing ofpictures and the delicate coloring of pastel colors by Arizona illustrator and artist, Ms. Cindy Work. ThisChildren s book is fun and educational for the youngest readers with a slight touch of poetry that will amusethe older kids such as Mom, Dad, Grandpa and Grandma when reading aloud to their precious brood.I hope you enjoy reading this as much as I enjoyed writing ARIZONA Is Where I Live .Rico Austin
author: Rico Austin
